attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increase the old age pension to ensure they are able to keep themselves warm etc.

This happens because the country will not look after them properly.

This increase would be achievable by considering reducing benefits such as 

1. Child benefits if prospective parents considered whether they could afford them. 

2. Unemployment Benefit - Where people have no intention of looking for work.

3. As well as increasing tax for very well off people or where they have more than one home where one is abroad

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
